entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-10-12
entry.content:
Issues

Closed

  • Dotnet watch and hot reload does not work in Linux projects when there is a dot in the folder name of the project #44010

Updated

  • error MSB3231: Unable to remove directory #42963
  • Track signature errors #42870
  • ToolInstallCommandTests.WhenRunWithRoot is flaky #42346
  • Microsoft.NET.Build.Containers.IntegrationTests are pulling from Docker Hub #42026
  • VMR CI build failures during restore: feed download failed #41590
  • Package reference alias tests are disabled #39172
    Backlog
  • VMR Unified Linux Build Failing #41030
  • .NET Framework build job test failure #40160
  • Darwin Build_Release failure on Helix tests - Tests timing out #40074
  • Test failure - AllWebProjectsRestoreAndBuild fails with Unbalanced Condition for F# MVC templates #40073
  • dotnet-watch tests failing #40006
  • Building with SDK 8.0.403 unexpectedly generates WinRT-related code #44026
  • 'dotnet tool install' command fails for platform linux/arm64 - Unhandled exception: System.NullReferenceException: Object reference not set to an instance of an object. #44051
  • option to ignore SSL error when install/update dotnet tool #44094
  • dotnet tool install with workaround NUGET_CERT_REVOCATION_MODE does no longer work #44123
  • `slnx` support in the `dotnet` CLI #40913
    9.0.2xx
  • [NETSDKE2E]Warning "NU1903: Package 'System.Text.Json' 6.0.0 has a known high severity vulnerability, https://github.com/advisories/GHSA-8g4q-xg66-9fp4" displays after creating MStest project in CLI. #44048

PullRequests

Created

  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/9.0.2xx' => 'main' #44126

Merged

  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0.4xx' => 'release/9.0.1xx' #44117
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/9.0.2xx' => 'main' #43959
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Update to the November release downlevel versions #43523
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

Updated

  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 140: Build ID 2558968 #43920
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Update the sdk target to net10.0 #43015
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Expand osx-arm64 test coverage #44008
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • WASM and agent refactoring #43975
    untriaged, Area-Workloads
